title: Fatal error: concurrent map iteration and map write
body:

Geth version: 1.8.12
OS & Version: CentOS / 7.5 x86_64 (64bit) 
Commit hash : none

#### Expected behaviour
NO crash

#### Actual behaviour
Crash

1. POA private ethereum
2. send a lot of transactions
